pull.title: Improve coverage of SHA256 SelfTest code
pull.body: The existing SelfTest code does not cover the specialized double-SHA256-for-64-byte-inputs transforms added in #13191. Fix this.

events.body: utACK 5edb0bc0e52a7be44ec22257e21ec9198f86acbb, assuming the tests actually pass. Thanks!
slightly tested ACK 5edb0bc0e52a7be44ec22257e21ec9198f86acbb, code looks good, does not seem to add noticable startup time.

events.message: Improve coverage of SHA256 SelfTest code
